0.1.name: wordpress/buddypress-profile-progression
0.1.description:
Simple plugin that adds a progress bar on members pages, which displays the percentage of profile completed by a user.

By default, each field of the profile, except the base field (Name), worth 1 point. If you have setup 10 fields and that your user has filled 4 fields, his progress bar will be at 40%.

If you want to customize how points are calculated (some fields can worth more than others); or add custom functions which must be taken into consideration (eg. you can give points if the user has an avatar), you can do it using hooks. Check the FAQ !
